content: Phase 1: Design Agent - Get UI/UX guidelines
Phase 1: Backend - Models, API endpoints (wizard, leads, uploads, events)
Phase 1: Frontend - Complete wizard flow (14+ screens) with branching logic
Phase 1: Auto-save, progress indicator, analytics tracking
Phase 1: All user stories covered in Development
Phase 1: End-to-end Testing via Testing Agent
Phase 2: OTP Login + Auto Account Creation
Phase 2: End-to-end Testing via Testing Agent
